name: Simple Fixed Notice
author: Digireturn

sections.description:
A simple but elegant banner visible on all pages of the site until the “Accept” button is clicked.
This plugin is compatible with WPML e Globalizy.

It connects to a page for customizing the text of the information page on the use of cookies and message and the button label. The plugin uses a technical cookie to remember the user’s choice.

Available the positioning of the banner, you can choose between “top” or “bottom”
Available “x” icon top right for close banner
sections.installation:
– Download the plugin.
– Install and active the plugin on your WordPress Admin site.
